title: "Practice" T-Shirt Lettering & Quillustration
content:
Hey y'all,

I had the pleasure of having a piece of lettering and illustration accepted to the newly formed, designer-driven, profit sharing t-shirt company Cotton Bureau. I have two more days to achieve 3 more pre-orders, or nobody gets to sport my intricately crafted design. Would love to see this go to print and worn with pride, I'm not sure why I didn't think to post this here earlier. Here's the link: [https://cottonbureau.com/products/practice](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414181516/https:/cottonbureau.com/products/practice "https://cottonbureau.com/products/practice")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414181516im_/http:/typophile.com/files/practiceshirt_4244.jpg)
author: dave bailey
